survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on sustainable tourism practices and preferences among travelers, focusing on eco-friendly accommodations, transportation, and activities.

questions.question_text: How important is sustainability when choosing a travel destination?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How important is sustainability when choosing a travel destination?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable travel practices do you actively seek out when planning a trip? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and randomize the order of options to reduce bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable travel practices do you actively seek out when planning a trip? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What barriers prevent you from engaging in more sustainable travel practices?
questions.client_notes: Include an optional open-ended field for 'Other' responses to capture additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio button question with an optional open-ended follow-up.

script.question_text: What barriers prevent you from engaging in more sustainable travel practices?

questions.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' barrier you mentioned in the previous question.
questions.client_notes: Use a text box to allow respondents to elaborate. Limit response length to 200 characters.

script.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' barrier you mentioned in the previous question.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to pay a premium for accommodations that prioritize sustainability?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Randomize the order of scale options if possible.

script.question_text: How likely are you to pay a premium for accommodations that prioritize sustainability?

questions.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly amenities would most influence your choice of accommodation?
questions.client_notes: Allow single selection to identify the most influential amenity. Randomize the order of options.

script.question_text: Which of the following eco-friendly amenities would most influence your choice of accommodation?

questions.question_text: How do you typically research sustainable travel options? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an optional open-ended field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox question with an optional open-ended follow-up.

script.question_text: How do you typically research sustainable travel options? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' method you use to research sustainable travel options.
questions.client_notes: Use a text box for detailed responses. Limit to 200 characters.

script.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' method you use to research sustainable travel options.

questions.question_text: Have you ever participated in a carbon offset program for travel?
answer_options: I don't know what this is
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Don't know' option to avoid forced responses. Randomize the order of 'Yes' and 'No'.

script.question_text: Have you ever participated in a carbon offset program for travel?
answer_options: I don't know what this is

questions.question_text: What would encourage you to participate in a carbon offset program in the future?
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an optional open-ended field for 'Other' responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkbox question with an optional open-ended follow-up.

script.question_text: What would encourage you to participate in a carbon offset program in the future?

questions.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' factor that would encourage you to participate in a carbon offset program.
questions.client_notes: Use a text box for detailed responses. Limit to 200 characters.

script.question_text: Please specify the 'Other' factor that would encourage you to participate in a carbon offset program.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable travel options in your preferred destinations?
questions.client_notes: Use a 6-point Likert scale to include a 'Not applicable' option. Randomize the order of scale options if possible.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of sustainable travel options in your preferred destinations?

questions.question_text: Do you think travel companies adequately promote their sustainable practices?
questions.client_notes: Include a 'Don't know' option to avoid forced responses. Randomize the order of 'Yes' and 'No'.

script.question_text: Do you think travel companies adequately promote their sustainable practices?

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable travel practices would you like to see more widely adopted?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable travel practices would you like to see more widely adopted?

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall awareness of sustainable tourism practices?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Randomize the order of scale options if possible.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall awareness of sustainable tourism practices?
